meanings: (머리에 얹다) place[put] sth on the head

vlive.korean: 확실히 우리가 방송인 인 게... I think we're entertainers... 듣기 View video INFINITE : INFINITE DONG WOO&HOYA’s 인피니트 동우&호야 X 같이먹어요
누군가의 고민을 들어준다는게 되게 좋은일 인것 같고 또 저는 그걸 되게 좋아해요. it is a good thing to listen to other people's concern and I actually like it. 듣기 View video MAP6 : MAP6(맵식스)-맵식이의 별이빛나는푸른밤키스더타임쇼!

vlive.korean: 우리가 준비했던 곡 중에 골라야 하는 게 베스트인 것 같거든. I think it's best to pick from what we have prepared. 듣기 View video d.o.b (DANCE OR BAND) : Ep.6 d.o.b(DANCE OR BAND)
vlive.english: I think it's best to pick from what we have prepared.

vlive.korean: 표정, 제스처 그리고 우리가 춤을 추는게 자신 있을수 있는 이유 인거 같아요. I think everyone is the reason why we're able to feel so confident with our poses, gestures, and dance moves. 듣기 View video VIXX : VIXX 'Kratos' Comeback Showcase
vlive.english: I think everyone is the reason why we're able to feel so confident with our poses, gestures, and dance moves.

vlive.korean: 요가를 알려드린다는 게 외국 사람인 저한테는 쉽지가 않았어요. for me to teach yoga since I am a foreigner. 듣기 View video V Beauty : 리에와 요가Talk_요가 어렵지 않아요~ 쉬운 요가 자세 Akiba Rie Yoga Talk
vlive.english: for me to teach yoga since I am a foreigner.
